thread.title: Deus Ex: Mankind Divided DLC A Criminal Past is coming in February
thread.title_full: Deus Ex: Mankind Divided DLC A Criminal Past is coming in February

title: Deus Ex: Mankind Divided DLC A Criminal Past is coming in February
text:
The story DLC tells the tale of Adam Jensen's first mission for Task Force 29. Shares 
The second Deus Ex: Mankind Divided story DLC, entitled A Criminal Past, will send hero Adam Jensen off to the sunny climes of Arizona to go undercover in a high-security, augs-only prison. The mission: to make contact with another operative who went in before him and has since "gone dark," and retrieve the information he carries. 
A Criminal Past will take place during Jensen's first mission for Task Force 29, before the events of Mankind Divided. A successful extraction of the sensitive data will help in the fight against terror around the world, "but Jensen will need to confront a darker side to his role before the day is done," the announcement says. The mission will feature a return of Dr. Delara Auzenne, the TF29 psychiatrist, who for reasons of spoiler protection we will discuss no further. 
Deus Ex: Mankind Divided – A Criminal Past will be out on February 23. Pricing hasn't been announced, but the first story DLC, System Rift, goes for $12/£9.50/€12 , so I'd expect something similar. ABOUT THE AUTHOR Andy Chalk As lead news writer during ‘merican hours, Andy covers the day-to-day events that keep PC gaming so interesting, exciting, and occasionally maddening. He’s fond of RPGs, FPSs, dungeons, Myst, and the glorious irony of his parents buying him a TRS-80 instead of an Atari so he wouldn't end up wasting his life on videogames. Topics
